topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a298e96368723ad90e0000#post_53a298e96368723ad90e0000
[bq="Randomosaur"]I think this fandom is dying.[/bq]
If I had to take a guess the brony fandom would be one of those fandoms that started out as a defense against the stereotypes towards gender likes/dislikes and now that it's mainstream it's no longer viewed as abnormal to watch the show and therefore the fandom is no longer needed to watch the show and as a result a lot of people that were bronies are becoming mere watchers of the show and not a part of the fandom.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

Congress has a serious age problem though; in ten years they're going to start dropping like flies due to old age.  They're going to have to get a shovel eventually.

To continue; I will not vote on this bill because it fundamentally (thud) And Mary too; yes you with the shovel put her in the bin too. . . This bill changes everything about how the current rules for (thud)"
"Shovel time Andy"
